## ValidationErrorsComponent.show() method

Shows validation errors in component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  errors | [ValidationErrorsResult](./common-forms.validationerrorsresult.md) | Errors to be shown, or null if to be hidden |
